channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Marketing Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Marketing Platform

item.title: CVE-2017-1107|2024-08-05T13:25:17.235Z -- ibm -- marketing%20platform
item.description: IBM Marketing Platform 9.1.0, 9.1.2, 10.0, and 10.1 exposes sensitive information in the headers that could be used by an authenticated attacker in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 120906.

item.title: CVE-2018-1920|2024-08-05T04:14:39.450Z -- ibm -- marketing%20platform
item.description: IBM Marketing Platform 9.1.0, 9.1.2 and 10.1 is vulnerable to a XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 152855.

item.title: CVE-2018-1424|2024-08-05T03:59:39.052Z -- ibm -- marketing%20platform
item.description: IBM Marketing Platform 9.1.0, 9.1.2, and 10.1 is vulnerable to a XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 139029.
